attributes.action: make a personal, public appeal for witnesses to come forward in relation to the disappearance of Madeleine McCann in the Algarve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister's involvement would give this case a huge positive boost in publicity, given his high international profile. The crimestoppers new telephone line which has been established for people living abroad, could be promoted as part of this public appeal for information.
